settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
HOW


WET HAIR

Apply 2 pumps to hair from middle to ends (style as desired).


DRY HAIR

Apply one more pump to styled hair or dry hair to tame flyaways.


WHEN

When your hair is wet, dry, clean, dirty - whenever you need a treat!


GOOD TO KNOW

Start with your most damaged areas. When dispensing serum into your palm, gently rub your hands together to ensure even application.
